revision.comment: moved [[NTDOOM]] to [[NTDoom]]: All-caps names are not used everywhere else (Boom, not BOOM, Doom, not DOOM) so why would they be used here?
revision.text:
[[image:ntdoom-screenshot.gif|thumb|328px|NTDoom running in 320x240 windowed]] Petteri Kangaslampi's Windows port of Doom, featuring high resolutions, high color, and music support. Its third and last version was released on January 29, 1998.
==External links== * [http://www.s2.org/ntdoom/ NTDoom homepage]
[[category:Non-ZDoom source ports]]
